listData.name: Virgin Money Boost Saver
listData.description: Your everyday Virgin Money Go Account comes perfectly bundled with a Boost Saver - our highest interest earning savings account - to help you smash your goals sooner.

features.additionalInfo: Earn an additional variable interest rate earned on a Boost Saver where the optional Lock Saver Feature is enabled. Provide 32 days' advance notice to unlock your account or withdraw your money. This feature may be suitable for savings you don't need to immediately access.
The Boost Saver comes linked with our seriously rewarding Everyday Go Account. It's a debit card that rewards you with points on every purchase. Monthly Criteria and T&Cs apply.
Feel safe knowing your deposits are guaranteed up to $250,000 per customer by the Australian Government's Financial Claims Scheme
Get Clever insights and real-time alerts
Use your mobile number or email address to receive PayID payments

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be at least 14 years of age to apply for a Virgin Money Boost Saver

fees.name: Currency Conversion
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged for any International Transaction which includes: any transaction made in a foreign currency; or when any transaction is processed outside of Australia (in Australian dollars or a foreign currency). It is calculated as a percentage of the Australian dollar equivalent.

fees.name: Manual Statement
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request a manual statement to be generated and emailed to you. All statements are available on the Virgin Money App and can be accessed for closed accounts.

fees.name: Unclaimed Monies
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when the unclaimed monies process starts which is after 7 years of inactivity.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each direct debit that is dishonoured on the same day that the dishonour takes place.

fees.name: International Balance Enquiry
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a balance enquiry is performed at an ATM outside of Australia. A fee may also be charged by the ATM and should be displayed on the screen before proceeding with the withdrawal.

fees.name: Internation ATM Withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a withdrawal is performed at an ATM outside of Australia. A fee may also be charged by the ATM owner and should be displayed on the screen before proceeding with the withdrawal.

fees.name: Cheque Dishonour
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each Cheque deposit that is dishonoured on the same day that the dishonour takes place.

fees.name: Electronic Transaction Error Correction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when the bank is requested by you or the recipient Financial Institution or Biller, to correct an error you have made with a BPAY payment, using the 'Pay Someone' functionality, or NPP transaction.

fees.name: Cash and Cheque Deposit
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each cheque or cash deposit that is made into your account.

fees.name: Domestic Emergency Card Replacement
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when we courier a card to you within Australia.

fees.name: International Emergency Card Replacement
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when we courier a card to you internationally.

fees.name: Paper Statement - International
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each paper statement that is required to be posted to an International Address.

fees.name: Failed Transaction Dispute
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a transaction dispute is unsuccessful.

fees.name: Domestic ATM Withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: We don't charge a fee to withdraw cash, however a fee may be charged by the ATM Operator and should be displayed on the screen before proceeding with the withdrawal. Most major bank ATMs do not charge a fee, giving you access to over 10,000 ATMs across Australia.

fees.name: BPAY,Pay Someone, Card Transactions
fees.additionalInfo: There is no fee charged by Virgin Money for performing a BPAY Payment, Pay Anyone or making a card transaction. Merchants may charge fee in respect of card transactions which should be advised to you at the time of making the transaction.

fees.name: Monthly Account Keeping
fees.additionalInfo: There are no monthly account keeping fees with our Virgin Money Deposit Accounts.

fees.name: Trace
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each request to perform a trace on any transaction type.

fees.name: Bank Cheque
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each bank cheque that is produced and posted to an Australian address.

fees.name: Paper Statement - Domestic
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each paper statement that is required to be posted to an address in Australia.

depositRates.additionalValue: Additional variable interest rate earned on a Boost Saver where the optional Lock Saver Feature is enabled.
depositRates.additionalInfo: Additional variable interest rate earned on a Boost Saver where the optional Lock Saver Feature is enabled. Provide 32 days' advance notice to unlock your account or withdraw your money.

depositRates.additionalValue: Over 18 years -  Deposit $1000 or more from an external account into your Go Account and make at least 5 purchases direct debits or BPAY payments each month. Under 18 years - No minimum deposit or purchases are required.

detailData.name: Virgin Money Boost Saver
detailData.description: Your everyday Virgin Money Go Account comes perfectly bundled with a Boost Saver - our highest interest earning savings account - to help you smash your goals sooner.

listData.name: Virgin Australia Velocity High Flyer Credit Card
listData.description: If you love to travel, the Virgin Australia Velocity High Flyer Card is for you. Earn Velocity Points on your everyday spend, plus enjoy exclusive flight benefits and a range of complimentary insurances. It's a seriously rewarding credit card https://virginmoney.com.au/credit-card

cardArt.title: VMA High Flyer CC Card Art

features.additionalInfo: 0% p.a. for 12 months on balance transfers. Reverts to cash advance rate. No interest free days apply to purchases while you have a balance transfer.

Earn up to 80,000 bonus Velocity Points and 100 Bonus Status Credits with a Virgin Australia Velocity High Flyer Card (40,000 bonus Velocity Points will be awarded for each month $3,500 or more is spent on eligible purchases for the first 2 months from card approval. New and approved customers only. Offer ends 25/11/24).
Up to 100 Bonus Status Credits each year you purchase. Fly on an eligible Virgin Australia flight and you'll get rewarded with up to 100 Status Credits each year.
Earn 2 extra Velocity Points for every $1 spent directly with Virgin Australia using your High Flyer Credit Card.
$89 additional cardholder fee applies. Charged annually.

Cardholders are entitled to International Travel Insurance which may cover you and your family when travelling overseas, for overseas medical expenses, loss or theft of personal items, unexpected trip cancellation and more when you purchase your overseas travel tickets on your Virgin Australia Velocity High Flyer Card.

Eligible cardholders can access Domestic travel insurance which may cover you and your family when travelling interstate, for medical expenses, loss or theft of personal items, unexpected trip cancellations and more when you book with your Virgin Australia High Flyer Card

Cardholders receive 90 days complimentary insurance against loss, theft or accidental damage on covered products purchased anywhere in the world using your Virgin Australia Velocity Flyer or High Flyer Card up to specified amounts

features.additionalValue: Rental Vehicle Excess Insurance in Australia
features.additionalInfo: Eligible cardholders may be eligible for coverage of rental vehicle damage or theft for you and your family when travelling within Australia

Rest assured that we're on the case, to keep your card safe around the clock with FraudshieldÂ®. As long as you keep your contact details up to date, we'll contact you if we detect any irregular transactions on your account. Our cards also come with Visa's Zero Liability policy, ensuring you won't be held liable for fraudulent transactions made with your card.

Reward yourself with a lower rate. Apply for an instalment plan that lets you pay off your card balance with certainty and allows you the potential to save on monthly interest that you may otherwise pay. Plus you can still enjoy interest free days on your other purchases made outside the Fixed Payment Option.
Up to 44 days on retail purchases. No interest free days apply to purchases while you have a balance transfer.
Relax, with two complimentary Single Entry Virgin Australia domestic Lounge passes, on us, each year.
Turn your everyday credit card spend into flights, accommodation and more.

Gain access to unique Visa privileges such as a range of great reduced holiday offers on hotels and resorts around the globe & up to 30% discount on green fees at some of the most prestigious golf clubs around the world. With Visa Platinum Benefits you'll also get exclusive access to pre-sale tickets to some of the most sought-after events in Australia.

Enjoy an exclusive $129 Virgin Australia Gift Voucher each year. To unlock your benefit, simply make a retail purchase in the 2 months prior to requesting your voucher.You also get to relax, with two complimentary Single Entry Virgin Australia domestic Lounge passes, on us, each year.

Cardholders receive 90 days complimentary insurance against loss, theft or accidental damage on covered products purchased anywhere in the world using your Virgin Australia Velocity High Flyer Card up to specified amounts as outlined in the Complimentary Insurance Terms and Conditions.

Cardholders may be entitled to extended warranty insurance of up to 12 months which may cover you at the end of the Australian warranty period that applies to covered products you purchase on your Virgin Australia Velocity High Flyer card as outlined in the Complimentary Insurance Terms and Conditions.

Take advantage of round-the-clock access to the Visa Platinum Concierge Service. It's the next best thing to having your very own personal assistant and all it takes is a phone call or a mouse click, anytime, anywhere in the world.
For purchases of up to $100, simply wave & go anywhere that has a Visa payWave sensor, making payments easy and convenient.

This cover provides certain benefits in the event of accidental death and cover for cardholders who sustain an injury whilst on a trip, while riding as a passenger in or boarding or alighting transport while overseas, where the entire trip has been purchased on your Virgin Australia Velocity Flyer or High Flyer Card, as outlined in the Complimentary Insurance Terms and Conditions.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be at least 18 years of age to apply for a credit card

listData.name: Virgin Money No Annual Fee Credit Card
listData.description: Introducing our No Annual Fee credit card, where you'll enjoy all the advantages of having a credit card without having to pay an annual fee. Zip, Zero, Zilch, Nada. Absolutely nothing. So go ahead and make the switch to the card that makes nothing of it.

cardArt.title: VMA No Annual Fee CC Card Art

features.additionalInfo: Reward yourself with a lower rate. Apply for an instalment plan that lets you pay off your card balance with certainty and allows you the potential to save on monthly interest that you may otherwise pay. Plus you can still enjoy interest free days on your other purchases made outside the Fixed Payment Option.
You can earn loads of Virgin Money Bonus Points from a range of partner offers, all from the palm of your hand in the Rewards Hub of the Virgin Money app.
Up to 55 days on retail purchases No interest free days apply to purchases while you have a balance transfer.
No annual fee. Zip, Zilch, Zero, Nada.
For purchases of up to $100, simply wave & go anywhere that has a Visa payWave sensor, making payments easy and convenient.

Our cards also come with Visa's Zero Liability policy, ensuring you won't be held liable for fraudulent transactions made with your card.

listData.name: Virgin Australia Velocity Flyer Credit Card
listData.description: Go places faster with our award-winning Virgin Australia Velocity Flyer credit card. Turn your everyday spend into flights, accomodation and more. The sky's the limit.

features.additionalInfo: $39 additional cardholder fee applies. Charged annually.
0% p.a. interest for 24 months. Reverts to cash advance rate with a 1% balance transfer fee.
Enjoy an exclusive $129 Virgin Australia Gift Voucher each year. To unlock your benefit, simply make a retail purchase in the 2 months prior to requesting your voucher.

Cardholders receive 90 days complimentary insurance against loss, theft or accidental damage on covered products purchased anywhere in the world using your Virgin Australia Velocity Flyer or High Flyer Card up to specified amounts
Take out a Velocity Flyer Card, spend $1,500 on your card each month in the first 2 months and youâll get 30,000 Velocity Points each month, for a total of up to 60,000 Points.
Earn 1 extra Velocity Point for every $1 spent directly with Virgin Australia.

Reward yourself with a lower rate. Apply for an instalment plan that lets you pay off your card balance with certainty and allows you the potential to save on monthly interest that you may otherwise pay. Plus you can still enjoy interest free days on your other purchases made outside the Fixed Payment Option.

Cardholders may be entitled to extended warranty insurance of up to 12 months in addition to the covered product's Australian warranty period, which you purchase on your Virgin Australia Velocity Flyer or High Flyer card
For purchases of up to $100, simply wave & go anywhere that has a Visa payWave sensor, making payments easy and convenient.

Rest assured that we're on the case, to keep your card safe around the clock with Fraudshield. As long as you keep your contact details up to date, we'll contact you if we detect any irregular transactions on your account. Our cards also come with Visa's Zero Liability policy, ensuring you won't be held liable for fraudulent transactions made with your card.

Take advantage of round-the-clock access to the Visa Platinum Concierge Service. It's the next best thing to having your very own personal assistant and all it takes is a phone call or a mouse click, anytime, anywhere in the world.
Turn your everyday credit card spend into flights, accommodation and more.

Imagine having first choice of seats to some of the most sought-after events in Australia. No queuing, no waiting, no disappointment to some of the biggest concerts, hottest shows and most exciting sports events, before pre-sales and before they go on sale to the general public.
0% p.a. for 24 months on balance transfers. Reverts to cash advance rate. No interest free days apply to purchases while you have a balance transfer.
Up to 44 days interest free for your purchases (Interest Free Days are not available if you have a Balance Transfer)

features.additionalInfo: New customers will earn 5,000 Bonus Virgin Money Points when you meet the welcome offer criteria. Offer ends 31/8/23.
Get 8 Virgin Money points on every purchase, direct debit and BPAY payment when you meet the Monthly Criteria
Get Clever insights and real-time alerts

Virgin Money Rewards is our all-new rewards program, available on Virgin Money transaction and savings accounts. It neatly bundles Virgin Money Points, epic perks and great experiences, all tailored to you. Whether you're spending big, saving hard, or simply building better money habits, we're all for recognising and rewarding you every day, not just someday.
Easily track your spending and understand your money habits
Your everyday Virgin Money Go Account comes perfectly paired with our high interest Virgin Money Boost Saver.

listData.name: Reward Me Variable Rate Home Loan
listData.description: Our Reward Me Variable Rate Home Loan offers competitive interest rates and extra flexibility with the ability to redraw and make unlimited additional repayments - so that if things change you can too

features.additionalInfo: Our Reward Me Home Loan comes with a Home Loan Companion Account that we'll open for you. Every dollar that you keep in this account offsets the interest costs on your variable rate loan, so it reduces the amount of interest you'll have to pay on your home loan and will help you pay it off sooner. Now, that makes perfect sense! As long as you have a positive balance in this account, you won't be charged any ongoing fees for maintaining it. We'll use this account to debit ongoing fees and charges across your loans and you can use it to make the repayments on your loan.

You can split your borrowings and lock in a portion of your loan with a fixed rate to get repayment certainty over a fixed period. That way you'll have some protection if rates rise during that period, but maintain some flexibility with the variable portion of your loan to make extra repayments or access funds through redraw if things change.
If you're ahead of your minimum repayments, you can redraw those funds online at any time (minimum redraw amount $100) with no extra charges.
We recognise and reward the value of our customers with discounted variable interest rates based on loan size and loan-to-value ratio
Unlimited additional repayments

eligibility.additionalInfo: Purchase or refinance of residential property
Purchase of vacant land & construction (home & land package
Individual and joint personal applicants, no companies or trusts

fees.name: Home Loan Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged to each loan account on every repayment date (monthly)

fees.name: Cheque dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $15 for each item. Banking of cheques only available at settlement.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: First Valuation - Free. Any further valuation will be charged for. The amount of the fee, will be the fee charged by the appointed Valuer and will vary depending on the location and value of the property

fees.name: Document Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if a new set of loan documents needs to be issued due to a change in your requirements

fees.name: Call Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged whenever we visit you after a default has occurred.

fees.name: Additional security fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when more than one security is required

fees.name: Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for completing settlement of your loans

fees.name: Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable wherever we give consent (following a request from you) to a change in security

fees.name: Mortgagee Sale Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each property we hold as security for a loan facility where the lender commences mortgagee sale procedures (whether or not a sale is completed).

fees.name: Notice to Tenant Requiring Vacant Possession Fee
Legal Review Fees - Complex
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each document that the Lender is required to review, amend or prepare and which is categorised by the Lender as a complex document. A complex document may include, but is not limited to: - agreements/deeds; or - amendment or preparation of a mortgage over lease, right of entry, mortgageeï¿½s consent to lease.

fees.name: Substitution of Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we agree to substitute one security for another security

fees.name: Top up Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you apply to top up your loan (6 months or more after settlement) and we agree to increase

fees.name: Default Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable 10 days after a repayment date if you have not paid your repayment or any other payment in full on or before that repayment date.

fees.name: Security Release Fee (full or partial)
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we agree (at your request) to discharge a security

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if a certificate of title or any security is required to be produced to another financial institution.

fees.name: Application Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for processing application of your loans. Charged at settlement

fees.name: Legal Review Fees - Standard
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each document that the Lender is required to review, amend or prepare and which is categorised by the Lender as a standard document. A standard document may include but is not limited to: - review of a consent document, power of attorney or a caveat; or - amendment or preparation of a consent document, deed of covenant, confidentiality agreement,cross guarantee and indemnity, deed of subordination, fixed charge or a deed of priority.

fees.name: Switching Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for loans converted to another type of loan

detailData.name: Reward Me Variable Rate Home Loan
detailData.description: Our Reward Me Variable Rate Home Loan offers competitive interest rates and extra flexibility with the ability to redraw and make unlimited additional repayments - so that if things change you can too

listData.name: Virgin Money Anytime Rewards Credit Card
listData.description: Our highest Virgin Money Points earning credit card. Earn 1 Point for every $1 you spend on the card, with no limit to the points you can rack up.

features.additionalInfo: 0% p.a. for 24 months on balance transfers with a 1% balance transfer fee. Reverts to cash advance rate. You will be charged interest on retail purchases while you have a balance transfer.
0% p.a. for 12 months on balance transfers. Reverts to cash advance rate. No interest free days apply to purchases while you have a balance transfer.

Reward yourself with a lower rate. Apply for an instalment plan that lets you pay off your card balance with certainty and allows you the potential to save on monthly interest that you may otherwise pay. Plus you can still enjoy interest free days on your other purchases made outside the Fixed Payment Option.

Take out the Virgin Money Anytime Rewards Credit Card and be rewarded with 80,000 bonus Virgin Money Points (worth $400 in gift cards) when you spend $3,000 or more on eligible purchases in your first 3 months from card approval
Earn 1 Virgin Money Point for every $1 you spend on the card, with no limit to the points you can rack up.
Up to 55 days interest free for your purchases (Interest Free Days are not available if you have a Balance Transfer)

Imagine having first choice of seats to some of the most sought-after events in Australia. No queuing, no waiting, no disappointment to some of the biggest concerts, hottest shows and most exciting sports events, before pre-sales and before they go on sale to the general public.
For purchases of up to $100, simply wave & go anywhere that has a Visa payWave sensor, making payments easy and convenient.
$0 Annual additional cardholder fee

Take advantage of round-the-clock access to the Visa Platinum Concierge Service. It's the next best thing to having your very own personal assistant and all it takes is a phone call or a mouse click, anytime, anywhere in the world.

Rest assured that we're on the case, to keep your card safe around the clock with Fraudshield. As long as you keep your contact details up to date, we'll contact you if we detect any irregular transactions on your account. Our cards also come with Visa's Zero Liability policy, ensuring you won't be held liable for fraudulent transactions made with your card.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be at least 18 years of age to apply for a credit card

listData.name: Reward Me Fixed Rate Home Loan
listData.description: With our Reward Me Home Loan, we keep our rates low so you could keep more money in your pocket

features.additionalInfo: Our Reward Me Home Loan comes with a Home Loan Companion Account that we'll open for you. The Companion Account will make it easier to make repayments and pay any fees and charges. Plus, you can use the account to offset the interest on your variable rate home loan or when you revert to a variable rate to help you pay the loan off sooner.
Additional repayment up to $10,000 per annum allowed on all fixed rate terms.

You can split and keep a portion of your borrowings with a variable rate to retain more flexibility. That way you'll have some protection if rates rise during your fixed rate period, but maintain some flexibility with the variable portion of your loan to make extra repayments or access funds through redraw if things change
Ask us to lock in a rate at the time of application for up to 100 days to protect yourself from any potential rate rises until the lending date. Fees and charges apply.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individual and joint personal applicants, no companies or trusts
Purchase or refinance of residential property
Purchase of vacant land & construction (home & land package

fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each document that the Lender is required to review, amend or prepare and which is categorised by the Lender as a standard document. A standard document may include but is not limited to: - review of a consent document, power of attorney or a caveat; or - amendment or preparation of a consent document, deed of covenant, confidentiality agreement,cross guarantee and indemnity, deed of subordination, fixed charge or a deed of priority.

fees.name: Break Cost Admin Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we break your fixed rate contract. This fee is payable regardless of whether a break cost is incurred or not

fees.name: Default Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable 10 days after a repayment date if you have not paid your repayment or any other payment in full on or before that repayment date.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: First Valuation - Free. Any further valuation will be charged for. The amount of the fee, will be the fee charged by the appointed Valuer and will vary depending on the location and value of the property

fees.name: Legal Review Fees - Complex
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each document that the Lender is required to review, amend or prepare and which is categorised by the Lender as a complex document. A complex document may include, but is not limited to: - agreements/deeds; or - amendment or preparation of a mortgage over lease, right of entry, mortgageeï¿½s consent to lease.

fees.name: Break Costs
fees.additionalInfo: At cost. Actual break cost amount will depend on the cost incurred by the Lender. The amount is calculated in accordance with your loan agreement and may be payable if: A fixed rate period is broken (by you paying out the loan or changing loan types or as aconsequence of a default causing the full amount of the loan to fall due for payment); or You pay more than the total of your elected repayments plus $10,000 in any 12 month periodduring your fixed rate period; or A Break Cost event occurs and we make a loss from re-arranging our funding.

detailData.name: Reward Me Fixed Rate Home Loan
detailData.description: With our Reward Me Home Loan, we keep our rates low so you could keep more money in your pocket

listData.name: Home Loan Companion Account
listData.description: Our Home Loan Companion Account is a simple account designed primarily for offsetting against your home loan balance but also to assist with settlement of your loan

features.additionalInfo: free funds transfer and BPAY
ability to offset interest costs against your nominated variable rate loan
free Direct Debits
no ongoing fees
no minimum monthly balance
free Pay Anyone payments

Under the Financial Claims Scheme (FCS) the Australian Government guarantees certain deposits up to $250 000 held with an authorised deposit-taking institution (ADI). The Home Loan Companion Account is issued by Bank of Queensland Limited, and as such, qualifying deposits placed into that account are covered under the government guarantee provided to Bank of Queensland Limited (the ADI)
free Direct Credits to the account

fees.name: Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: (Outward) Charged to your account for each item dishonoured on the day when any drawing on your account (direct debit) is dishonoured due to lack of available funds or irregularity of drawing.

fees.name: Overdrawn Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: each item paid, up to a maximum of once per account, per day. Charged to your account on the day where drawings are paid and the account subsequently becomes overdrawn without prior approved arrangements, or where an approved overdraft limit is exceeded. Note: An Overdrawn Account Interest Rate will also apply. The rate applied to your overdrawn account may change for time to time and can be found at: Virgin Money | Everyday Banking, Credit Cards, Home Loans, Superannuation, Car Insurance, Life Insurance, Income Protection & Home and Contents | Virgin Money Australia
